entry.dcterms:title: TÁRKI Omnibus 1998/6. Social-political attitudes in Hungary among the adult population.
entry.dcterms:creator: Zsadányi-Nagy, Csaba
entry.dcterms:subject: TÁRKI Joint Research Center TDATA-D85: TÁRKI Omnibus 1998/6. Social-political attitudes in Hungary among the adult population.. data sheet. Version: 2007-02-12

3. Tibori, Tímea
4. Polonyi, Gábor
entry.dcterms:contributor: Hungarian Academy of Sciences Institute of Sociology (3.)
entry.dcterms:description: 1. party preferences, opinions of the population about government decisions with regard to metro line number 4 and the Hangarian National Theatre 2. opinions about pension funds 3. cultural consumption 4. opinions about banks
entry.dcterms:subject: political institutions, public administration
mass political behavior, attitudes
economic conditions and indicators
transport, travel (and mobility)
labour and employment
drug abuse, alcohol and smoking
economic policy
cultural activities and participation
society and culture
income, property and savings
mass media
law, crime and legal systems
demography
social behaviour and attitudes
person
survey data
cross-section

A multi-stage proportionally stratified random probability sample representative of the Hungarian adult population. Unsuccessful inquiries were substituted with supplementary addresses, where persons to be interviewed were selected on the basis of the Leslie Kish key.
face-to-face interview
block 1: A, block 2: A, block 3: B, block 4: A
